subject: Football
Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
lead_paragraph: The Jets signed cornerback Dwight Lowery, the team’s fourth-round pick. Lowery started all 25 games at cornerback in two seasons at San Jose State, with 13 interceptions, including a university-record 9 in 2006. The Jets have signed three of their six draft picks, with the first-rounders Vernon Gholston and Dustin Keller, and the fifth-rounder Erik Ainge, still unsigned. The Jets’ first training camp practice is July 24.
